title: Ant Colony: New War
description: Ant Colony: New War is an action clicker idle game where you are tasked to grow an ant colony. What fun! Explore a vast array of territories and engage in fierce battles with rival colonies as you strive for total dominance. Gather valuable resources to strengthen your forces and challenge other players in intense PvP combat. Strategically build and expand your colony, assembling the ultimate ant army capable of conquering any opposition.
